name: cycle-meyda-driver
description: A Cycle.js driver for audio feature extraction using Meyda.js
author: Michael Jae-Yoon Chung

scripts.build:doc: ../../node_modules/.bin/markdox ./src/* -o api.md && sed -i '1s/^.*$/\n# API/' api.md && sed -i 's/^#.*/#&/' api.md && cat ../../docs/readmes/${PWD##*/}.md api.md > README.md && rm api.md
